name: [BETA] Snakes on an Extradimensional Plane
description:
This is a prototype created for the VR Austin Game Jam. The full version will soon be out on Steam.

Help the flying jetpack astronaut mice escape the angry neon snakes! Keep it up and go for the high score!

Score increases over time + from getting score pickups. The snakes speed up over time, but can be slowed down by picking up the correct powerups.

Requires a SteamVR compatible headset + controllers.

The game was made for the VR Austin 2016 Game Jam.

Created by:

  • Fox Buchele
  • Timothy Johnson
  • Andreas Jörgensen

SFX created by Jeff McMillen, music by Kevin MacLeod.
